languages.text: "Не надейся, что, подражая мне и слушая ручного нелюдя, поймешь из вкуса мыслей этого еретика то, что понимаю я. Я совершаю это с отвращением и во имя Императора, ты — с болезненным удовольствием и во имя своего извращенного любопытства".

"Do not hope that mimicking me and listening to your pet inhuman will let you glean the things I have gleaned from the taste of this heretic's thoughts. I do this with disgust and in the Emperor's name, while you are driven by morbid delight and twisted curiosity."
languages.original_text: "Не надейся, что, подражая мне и слушая ручного нелюдя, поймешь из вкуса мыслей этого еретика то, что понимаю я. Я совершаю это с отвращением и во имя Императора, ты — с болезненным удовольствием и во имя своего извращенного любопытства".

traits.locale_text: "Do not hope that mimicking me and listening to your pet inhuman will let you glean the things I have gleaned from the taste of this heretic's thoughts. I do this with disgust and in the Emperor's name, while you are driven by morbid delight and twisted curiosity."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Do not hope that mimicking me and listening to your pet inhuman will let you glean the things I have gleaned from the taste of this heretic's thoughts. I do this with disgust and in the Emperor's name, while you are driven by morbid delight and twisted curiosity."

traits.locale_text: "Do not hope that mimicking me and listening to your pet inhuman will let you glean the things I have gleaned from the taste of this heretic's thoughts. I do this with disgust and in the Emperor's name, while you are driven by morbid delight and twisted curiosity."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: “别以为模仿我的行为，听你那只异形宠物说话，就能让你了解到我刚刚领悟到的事情。我是带着厌恶的心情，以帝皇的名义这么做的，可你们的动机却是病态的喜悦与扭曲的好奇心。”
languages.original_text: "Do not hope that mimicking me and listening to your pet inhuman will let you glean the things I have gleaned from the taste of this heretic's thoughts. I do this with disgust and in the Emperor's name, while you are driven by morbid delight and twisted curiosity."

traits.locale_text: “别以为模仿我的行为，听你那只异性宠物说话，就能让你了解到我刚刚领悟到的事情。我是带着厌恶的心情，以帝皇的名义这么做的，可你们的动机却是病态的喜悦与扭曲的好奇心。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「私の真似をし、亜人のペットの話を聞くことで、私がこの異端者の脳から導き出した情報を収集できるなどと思うな。私は苦痛に耐えつつも皇帝の名の下行っているのだ。だが、お前はどうだ？病的な楽しみと歪んだ好奇心で行っているだけだ」
languages.original_text: "Do not hope that mimicking me and listening to your pet inhuman will let you glean the things I have gleaned from the taste of this heretic's thoughts. I do this with disgust and in the Emperor's name, while you are driven by morbid delight and twisted curiosity."

traits.locale_text: 「私の真似をし、亜人のペットの話を聞くことで、私がこの異端者の脳から導き出した情報を収集できるなどと思うな。私は苦痛に耐えつつも皇帝の名の下行っているのだ。だが、お前はどうだ？病的な楽しみと歪んだ好奇心で行っているだけだ」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «No espere que imitarme y escuchar a su mascota no humana le permita averiguar lo que yo he recopilado del sabor de los pensamientos de este hereje. Lo hago con repugnancia en nombre del Emperador, mientras que a usted le mueve el placer morboso y la curiosidad retorcida».
languages.original_text: "Do not hope that mimicking me and listening to your pet inhuman will let you glean the things I have gleaned from the taste of this heretic's thoughts. I do this with disgust and in the Emperor's name, while you are driven by morbid delight and twisted curiosity."

traits.locale_text: «No espere que imitarme y escuchar a su mascota no humana le permita averiguar lo que yo he recopilado del sabor de los pensamientos de este hereje. Lo hago con repugnancia en nombre del Emperador, mientras que a usted le mueve el placer morboso y la curiosidad retorcida».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Ihr glaubt, wenn Ihr mich imitiert und auf Euren zahmen Unmenschen hört, erfahrt auch ihr, was ich durch die Verkostung der Gedanken dieses Ketzers erfahren habe? Diese Hoffnung ist umsonst. Ich tue das angewidert und im Namen des Imperators, während Ihr von morbidem Entzücken und kranker Neugier getrieben seid."
languages.original_text: "Do not hope that mimicking me and listening to your pet inhuman will let you glean the things I have gleaned from the taste of this heretic's thoughts. I do this with disgust and in the Emperor's name, while you are driven by morbid delight and twisted curiosity."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr glaubt, wenn Ihr mich imitiert und auf Euren zahmen Unmenschen hört, erfahrt auch ihr, was ich durch die Verkostung der Gedanken dieses Ketzers erfahren habe? Diese Hoffnung ist umsonst. Ich tue das angewidert und im Namen des Imperators, während Ihr von morbidem Entzücken und kranker Neugier getrieben seid."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Ne croyez pas qu'il vous suffit de m'imiter et d'écouter votre non-humain de compagnie pour déceler les mêmes choses que moi dans les pensées de cet hérétique. Si je fais cela, c'est avec dégoût et au nom de l'Empereur ; alors que vous, c'est par curiosité malsaine et par plaisir morbide. »
languages.original_text: "Do not hope that mimicking me and listening to your pet inhuman will let you glean the things I have gleaned from the taste of this heretic's thoughts. I do this with disgust and in the Emperor's name, while you are driven by morbid delight and twisted curiosity."

traits.locale_text: « Ne croyez pas qu'il vous suffit de m'imiter et d'écouter votre xénos de compagnie pour déceler les mêmes choses que moi dans les pensées de cet hérétique. Si je fais cela, c'est avec dégoût et au nom de l'Empereur ; alors que vous, c'est par curiosité malsaine et par plaisir morbide. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Beni taklit etmek ve evcil insan dışının sözünü dinlemek, bu kâfirin düşüncelerinin tadından elde ettiğim şeyleri senin de elde etmeni sağlayacak sanma. Ben bunu tiksintiyle ve İmparator adına yapıyorum, sen ise marazi zevklerini ve çarpık merakını tatmin etmek niyetindesin."
languages.original_text: "Do not hope that mimicking me and listening to your pet inhuman will let you glean the things I have gleaned from the taste of this heretic's thoughts. I do this with disgust and in the Emperor's name, while you are driven by morbid delight and twisted curiosity."

traits.locale_text: "Beni taklit etmek ve evcil insan dışının sözünü dinlemek, bu kâfirin düşüncelerinin tadından elde ettiğim şeyleri senin de elde etmeni sağlayacak sanma. Ben bunu tiksintiyle ve İmparator adına yapıyorum, sen ise marazi zevklerini ve çarpık merakını tatmin etme amacındasın."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
